mapper.select: select c.carAddress as carPlace, c.carNumber as carNumber, l.contractNumber as Contactno, l.contractStartDate as contractStrat, l.contractEndDate as contractEnd from t_cbdCarLease2 z, t_cbdCar2 c,t_lesseeContract2 l where z.cbdCarID=c.cbdCarID and z.lesseeContractID=l.lesseeContractID and l.lesseeContractID=#{id}
select carAddress carPlace, carNumber from t_cbdCar2 where cbdCarStatus=#{id}
select companyID, loginName as logName, loginPwd as logPass, companyName, floor, linkman linkMan, linkPhone from t_company2 where companyID=#{id} ;
